title: Main account not working
body: Hi I saw that you helped someone with the same issue my main account --snip--is the username but the screen name is --snip--and i cant log in at all and i already submitted a ticket please help

replies.body: I've edited out your info for security reasons.  No worries, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help locate your account.  We'll get back to you through the ticket as soon as we can!
#30309131 i already did the account recoverey thing and here was the ticket code thingy ) #30309131
Great!  The account team is best fit to help out with this, and not something we can assist with on the boards.  Your ticket has been received, and we'll respond as soon as able!
Hi sorry to bother again but it has been 2 days without a reply to my ticket and I really want to make sure my main account is safe an usuable
